title: Congo Mission: A Jack Sharp Novel
description: Congo Mission begins in Jack Sharp's younger days as a missionary in Congo in the 1980's. As a Christian missionary, Jack has stepped out beyond his comfort zone into an unfamiliar world desiring to do what he believes God wants of him. He faces challenges in every aspect of life, from daily meals to life saving surgery. Jack's skills, knowledge and faith are tested as he learns what life as a missionary has to offer. His will and character get a work out as well when danger and intrigue engulf his new life. A beautiful young woman brightens his future, while the peaceful jungle erupts as the seeds of rebellion begin to grow.
author: Scott A. McPherson
